traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The scout has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: War Pick
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10 damage) piercing damage.
